alert.note: Alert for Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued December 27 at 5:51AM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Coastal flooding expected. Breakers of 30 to 40 feet. The highest waves will occur during the late Tuesday morning through the evening. * WHERE...North Oregon Coast and Central Oregon Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Major flooding, up to one foot above ground level, during high tides is expected along the immediate coast as well as low lying areas near bays, sloughs, and the lower reaches of the coastal rivers. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong gusty south wind is expected tonight and Tuesday. Gusts 60 to 75 mph will be possible, strongest on beaches and headlands.
info.instruction: A Coastal Flood Warning means that flooding is occurring or imminent. Coastal residents in the warned area should be alert for rising water, and take appropriate action to protect life and property.

area.areaDesc: Central Oregon Coast; North Oregon Coast
